languages.text: Оружие, покрывшее себя вечной славой после участия в церковном поединке между мальпийцами и Орденом Молота.
This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.
languages.original_text: Оружие, покрывшее себя вечной славой после участия в церковном поединке между мальпийцами и Орденом Молота.

traits.locale_text: This weapon covered itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.
This weapon covered itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.
This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.
This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.
This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.

languages.text: Cette arme est devenue légendaire lorsqu'elle a été utilisée dans un duel cérémoniel entre les Malpiens et l'Ordre du Marteau.
languages.original_text: This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme est devenue légendaire lorsqu’elle a été utilisée dans un duel cérémoniel entre les Malpiens et l'Ordre du Marteau.

languages.text: この武器はマルピア人とハンマー騎士団の儀式的な一騎打ちで使用されたとき、その栄光に包まれた。
languages.original_text: This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: この武器はマルピア人とハンマー騎士団の儀式的な一騎打ちで使用されたとき、その栄光に包まれた。

languages.text: 这把武器曾在马尔皮人与重锤修会的决斗中被人使用过，这场荣耀的战斗为它增色不少。
languages.original_text: This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器曾在马尔皮恩人与重锤修会的决斗中被人使用过，这场荣耀的战斗为它增色不少。

languages.text: Esta arma se envainó de gloria cuando se utilizó en un ceremonioso combate individual entre los malpianos y la Orden del Martillo.
languages.original_text: This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma se envainó de gloria cuando se utilizó en un ceremonioso combate individual entre los malpianos y la Orden del Martillo.

languages.text: Diese Waffe hat sich ewigen Ruhm verdient, als sie im zeremoniellen Einzelkampf zwischen den Malpianern und dem Orden des Hammers eingesetzt wurde.
languages.original_text: This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe hat sich ewigen Ruhm verdient, als sie im zeremoniellen Einzelkampf zwischen den Malpianern und dem Orden des Hammers eingesetzt wurde.

languages.text: Bu silah, Malpililerle Çekiç Tarikatı arasındaki törensel tekli dövüşte kullanılıp zaferle kınına geri girmiştir.
languages.original_text: This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.
